DOC.brief_summary: Comparing primary PPV with 360Â° endolaser photocoagulation with primary PPV with an encircling band for patients with RRDs.
DOC.brief_title: Primary Vitrectomy With Endolaser or Encircling Band for Rhegmatogenous Retinal Detachment
DOC.criteria: Primary rhegmatogenous retinal detachment with or without maculaoff detachment phakic or pseudophakic eyes Multiple breaks, inferior and posterior located breaks or unclear hole formation Proliferative vitreoretinopathy (PVR) stage A and B Previous retinal detachment surgery Giant tears PVR stage C Age less than 18 years
